ai.summary: A short, easy woodland stroll on the Bourne Wood Yellow Route. At only 0.3 km, itâ€™s a quick option for a casual, family-friendly outing in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently graded forest paths with a soft surface. Tree cover provides shade and a tranquil setting.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths. Watch for exposed roots and uneven ground. Wear sturdy footwear and bring weather-appropriate clothing. Carry water; be mindful of weather changes and ticks in wooded areas.
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and autumn offer especially pleasant scenery, but a walk is suitable any season.

seo.title: Bourne Wood Yellow Route - Easy 0.3 km Woodland Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Bourne Wood Yellow Route, a short 0.3 km easy hike in the UK. Perfect for a quick, family-friendly woodland stroll.
